FuncDef: The reset service-chain statistics command deletes packet statistics of a service chain instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service chain instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you run the reset service-chain statistics command to delete packet statistics of a service chain instance, run the display service-chain statistics command. The command output helps determine whether service packets are lost on the service chain.
Configuration Impact
After the reset service-chain statistics command is run, normal running of the services is not affected, but the statistics deleted cannot be restored.
Precautions
Confirm your operation before you delete packet statistics. After the command is run, the statistics deleted cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when you run this command.
